nodes.text: Pappi was a male Human who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Pappi worked as a chef aboard the station Conkesta on the planet Genarius and following the destruction of Conkesta, he got a new job running the kitchen of the Burnout Cafetorium, a dining establishment located on the space station Burnout.

Pappi was a big man, and he ran a tight kitchen. He had a habit of twirling his vibro-cleaver whilst he talked. He wanted to be respected for his cookery work, and at Burnout, he planned to achieve this by feeding masses of individuals. He was also allergic to the seeds of the Bothan pepper tree.
